aspect.name: Genomics
aspect.subtitle: Genome annotation
aspect.intro-text: The gene structure and other genome annotation in PlantMine are provided by a variety of curated source databases. In most cases PlantMine includes all genome features that have chromosomal locations.

aspect.name: Proteins
aspect.subtitle:
Protein and proteomics
data
aspect.intro-text: Protein annotation (including family and domain annotation) from UniProt. .
